LanguageData.RimRayon.label: RimRayon
LanguageData.RimRayon.description: An early semisynthetic fibre. Made from cellulose (wood) and an organic base (chemfuel).
LanguageData.Synthbase.label: Synthbase
LanguageData.Synthbase.description: A synthetic precursor chemical. While it is useless on its own, it is used in the production of other synthetic materials.
LanguageData.RimPlasDevilSynth.label: DevilSynth
LanguageData.RimPlasDevilSynth.description: Synthetic version of Devilstrand cloth. An Improvement on the base material
LanguageData.RimPlas_Plasteel_Wool.label: Plasteel Wool
LanguageData.RimPlas_Plasteel_Wool.description: A synthetic fibre derived from Plasteel.
LanguageData.RimPlas_ElectroSteel_Wool.label: ElectroSteel Wool
LanguageData.RimPlas_ElectroSteel_Wool.description: A thin synthetic fibre derived from Steel and Silver.
LanguageData.RimPlas_Gold_Wool.label: Gold Wool
LanguageData.RimPlas_Gold_Wool.description: A thin synthetic fibre derived from Gold.
